definition: a room, building, or establishment where milk is kept and butter or cheese is made
the department of farming or of a farm that is concerned with the production of milk, butter, and cheese
a farm devoted to such production
an establishment for the sale or distribution chiefly of milk and milk products
milk from a cow or other domestic animal (such as a goat), food (such as ice cream, cheese, or yogurt) made primarily of or from milk
